org.easybatch.core.dispatcher

Class AbstractRecordDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easybatch.core.dispatcher.AbstractRecordDispatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordProcessor<Record,Record>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BroadcastRecordDispatcher, ContentBasedRecordDispatcher, RandomRecordDispatcher, RoundRobinRecordDispatcher

    public abstract class AbstractRecordDispatcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements RecordProcessor<Record,Record>
    Base class for record dispatchers.
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)
